page.title: 10HOLYWELL'S HEALTH VISITOR
page.content: {8.45}Write report to Delyn Housing Dept.re accomodation for O.A.P. {9.15}Telephone advice re feeding baby. {9.25}Telephone Delyn Social Services to arrange Home Help and Bath Aids. {9.40}Telephone Area Health re flooring in chiropodist's room and note change of clients addresses.9.50 Update files {10.15}Visit 10 day old baby-advise re clinic,childcare and immunisations. {10.45}Routine 18 month developmental screening.Advice-safety in the home. {11.00}Visit Geriatric Clinic and note any requirements.{11.15}Advise ante- natal mother re diets and financial benefits.Give encouragement{11.45}Call on family with problems.Observe,listen and advise as necessary.{12.30}Visit bereaved parents of handicapped child. {1.00}Mail time.{2.00-4.00}Baby Clinic and screening of babies 6 weeks,6 months,2 years.{4.30}Update files.
